review: The clinic was situated at the ground floor. The environment was very welcoming and homely .The waiting area is clean and well maintained , appointment always starts on time and whenever there is a change in schedule, she always takes the time and effort to directly inform me over phone.Initially I was a bit confused and tensed ,but the Dr Bhavana made me really comfortable.She talked with me though out the procedure with a smiling face.There was no hurry for patient.She focused on what is beneficial for me and clearly explained the precautions and side effects for the medicine and procedures prescribed. She *** **** ********* ** *** ***** *** gives a detailed description of the issue.

It was very helpful to meet Dr bhavna singla very understanding.She is patient and deals with kindness . Ensure we understand the problem and ways of how to deal with it as well.
The staff is very cooperative and helpful .It been a great experience at vcare super speciality clinic

The doctor was really nice ,warm and friendly .The treatment was very good and doctors guidance helped me recover extremely fast . Would definitely recommend doctor to everyone else.Thank you Dr bhavna singla.She is best gynaecologist in delhi for sure.

We are thankful to Dr Bhavana singla for making our dream come true and helping us in having our bundle of joy this April.Last year when me and my husband lost all hopes of having a child after every possible effort, one of my friend recommended Dr bhavna singla to go and consult about IVF.She is very friendly and patient towards her patient.she alway give proper time to her patient and her counseling helped us to come out of depression state of mind too.

It is wonderful experience from day 1 to till now with Dr bhavna singla and also the supporting staff.She listen to us very carefully and clear all our queries with very polite manner. She explains everything which needs to be explained.Last she is available all the time .If we have problems or struggle with any thing ,she is just one text away Always responded quickly doesn't matter if it 's midnight.
** ******* ** * **** ******** **** ** * good human being ,just wanted to say a big thanks to V care for making arrangements for good doctors team.
I am fully satisfied with treatment . My daughter & I visited the centre and felt very satisfied. I recommend this doctor for all gynae problems
